properties.Name: Entire Facility Boundary
properties.PopupInfo:
Cook Composites & Polymers Co.

920 Tightsqueeze Ind. Rd.
Chatham VA 2453

EPA ID #: VAD055046049

EPA web page for this facility

Area shown represents ENTIRE FACILITY

Institutional Controls for ENTIRE FACILITY include:

CA772EP - Enforcement and Permit tools

This institutional control is the facility's Hazardous Waste Permit for Corrective Action issued by VDEQ.

CA772PR - Proprietary Institutional Control

This institutional control is a Declaration of Restrictive Covenants on the property, recorded with Pittsylvania County, and includes certain restrictions on groundwater use, residential use, and subsurface excavation, among other things. The covenant is available at:

Environmental Covenant

Engineering Controls for ENTIRE FACILITY include:

CA770GW - Groundwater Engineering Control

This engineering control consists of a groundwater recovery and treatment system originally installed in 1982.

properties.Name: SA-3
properties.PopupInfo:
Cook Composites & Polymers Co.

920 Tightsqueeze Ind. Rd.
Chatham VA 2453

EPA ID #: VAD055046049

EPA web page for this facility

Area shown represents Sampling Area 3 (SA-3).

Institutional Controls for SA-3 include:

CA772EP - Enforcement and Permit tools

This institutional control is the facility's Hazardous Waste Permit for Corrective Action issued by VDEQ.

CA772PR - Proprietary Institutional Control

This institutional control is a Declaration of Restrictive Covenants on the property, recorded with Pittsylvania County, and includes certain restrictions on groundwater use, residential use, and subsurface excavation. Vapor barriers are required in or beneath new, totally enclosed structures designed for occupation within the footprint of SA-3, unless it is demonstrated to DEQ that isuch barriers are not necessary to protect human health. The covenant is available at:

Environmental Covenant
